room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
room_description:
It would seem that your distant yet eccentric uncle has suddenly passed away. Aside from rumors, you knew very little about your Uncle Nicky, only that he was a scientist of some sort and that he was very devoted to his work…

As a contingency plan for his death, your late uncle left hidden clues and instructions in his will for you to find and carry out. The Inheritance is a clue-like escape room that is part mystery and part mission. Arguably Nashville’s most challenging escape room, the details of this experience remain suspiciously vague.
